Follow-Up Gore.name: Follow-Up Gore
Follow-Up Gore.flavor: Your weapon strike unbalances your foe, leaving it exposed to your ferocious gore attack.
Follow-Up Gore.onHit: 1[W] + 2d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Bloodthirsty Shift.name: Bloodthirsty Shift
Bloodthirsty Shift.flavor: When an enemy of yours falls, you spring forward to engage the next foe.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points  Effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to an enemy.
Bloodthirsty Shift.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Bloodthirsty Shift.effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to an enemy.

Driving Gore.name: Driving Gore
Driving Gore.flavor: You swing your horns in a brutal arc, knocking your enemy back and down.
keywords: Melee 1  Effect: You charge and use the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.   Target: One creature   Attack: Strength + 8 vs. AC   Hit: 5d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 4 squares and knock it prone.   Miss: Half damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Driving Gore.effect: You charge and use the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.
Driving Gore.onHit: 5d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 4 squares and knock it prone.
Driving Gore.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
